Game.Name: Gem Smashers (USA)
Game.plot: Many ages ago. The Earth was populated by beings that lived in peace and harmony until a fearsome scientist named IMBU and his henchmen arrived to steal earth's energy, capture all the inhabitants and lock them up in crystal cells. Miraculously, three creatures escaped: BAU, BAM and BOM. They became Gem Smashers, traveling the world to spring, spin, and smash the crystal cells where their friends are imprisoned. It's up to you to help our little heroes survive!Cheat: Unlimited LivesGo to the options menu. Remain on the first option. Press the control pad right 7 times, then left 7 times, and then right 7 times again. The screen will flash indicating you input the code correctly. When you play the game and get killed, your lives will no longer decrease.
Game.Notes: Gem Smashers is an action puzzle game where the object is to free trapped animals by smashing colored gems. Players control one of three prehistoric critters in their quest to eliminate gems of the same color before time expires. Yet before players can smash the gems, they must first transform their character into the appropriate color by finding the correct power-up. Only then will players be able to eliminate all the gems and uncover the hidden exit where the imprisoned animals can escape. Game modes include Story, Arcade, and Vs. Battle, with three additional variants unlocked during the course of play.
